types\/sourcemap2.html?swift.abstract: A source map describing how each segment of a generated file corresponds to some original source file.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift.name: SourceMap

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#description.abstract: A short description of the source map.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#description.name: description

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#encode.abstract: Encode the source map as JSON
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#encode.name: encode()

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#encodestrin.abstract: Encode the source map as JSON in a string
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#encodestrin.name: encodeString()

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#file1.abstract: The name of the generated code file with which the source map is associated.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#file1.name: file

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#getsourceur.abstract: Get the URL of a source, incorporating the sourceRoot if set.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#getsourceur.name: getSourceURL(source:sourceMapURL:)

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#init_.abstract: Decode a source map from JSON Data.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#init_.name: init(_:)

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#init_1.abstract: Decode a source map from a JSON string.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#init_1.name: init(_:)

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#mappings1.abstract: The source map’s mappings in their compacted format.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#mappings1.name: mappings

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#names1.abstract: Names that can be associated with segments of the generated code.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#names1.name: names

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#segments.abstract: One list of Segments for every line in the generated code file.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#segments.name: segments

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#sourceroot1.abstract: Value to prepend to each sources URL before attempting their resolution.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#sourceroot1.name: sourceRoot

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#sources1.abstract: The original sources referred to from the source map.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#sources1.name: sources

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#version1.abstract: The expected version - 3 - of source maps.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#version1.name: VERSION

types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#version2.abstract: The spec version that this source map follows.
types\/sourcemap2.html?swift#version2.name: version

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift.abstract: A decoded segment of the source map.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift.name: Segment

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#co.abstract: The range of columns covered by this segment, or nil if not known.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#co.name: columns

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#de.abstract: A short human-readable description of the segment.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#de.name: description

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#fi.abstract: 0-based column in the generated code that starts the segment.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#fi.name: firstColumn

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#in.abstract: Initialize a segment from a Range of columns.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#in.name: init(columns:sourcePos:)

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#in.abstract: Initialize a segment from a ClosedRange of columns.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#in.name: init(columns:sourcePos:)

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#in.abstract: Initialize a segment from column indices.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#in.name: init(firstColumn:lastColumn:sourcePos:)

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#la.abstract:
0-based column in the generated code that ends the segment, or nil
indicating ‘until either the next segment or the end of the line’.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#la.name: lastColumn

types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#so.abstract: The original source position associated with the segment, or nil if there is none.
types\/sourcemap2\/segment.html?swift#so.name: sourcePos

types\/sourcemap2\/source.html?swift.abstract: The location and content of an original source referred to from the source map.
types\/sourcemap2\/source.html?swift.name: Source

types\/sourcemap2\/source.html?swift#con.abstract: The content, if any, recorded in the source map for this source.
types\/sourcemap2\/source.html?swift#con.name: content

types\/sourcemap2\/source.html?swift#url.abstract: The URL recorded in the source map for this source.
types\/sourcemap2\/source.html?swift#url.name: url

types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift.abstract: A position in an original source file.  Only has meaning in the context of a SourceMap.
types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift.name: SourcePos

types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.abstract: A short human-readable description of the position.
types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.name: description

types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.abstract: 0-based line index into the original source file.
types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.name: line

types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.abstract:
0-based index into SourceMap.names of any name associated with
the mapping segment, or nil if there is none.
types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.name: name

types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.abstract: 0-based index into SourceMap.sources of the original source.
types\/sourcemap2\/sourcepos.html?swift#.name: source

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift.abstract: Error conditions detected by the module.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift.name: SourceMapError

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#descrip.abstract: A short human-readable description of the error.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#descrip.name: description

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#inconsi.abstract: Source map decoding failed because the sources and sourcesContent fields have different cardinalities.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#inconsi.name: inconsistentSources(sourcesCount:sourcesContentCount:)

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.abstract: Source map decoding failed because of an invalid character in the mappings field.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.name: invalidBase64Character(_:)

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.abstract: Source map decoding failed because the format field’s value is invalid.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.name: invalidFormat(_:)

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.abstract: Source map encoding failed because a name index is out of range.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.name: invalidName(_:count:)

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.abstract: Source map encoding failed because a source index is out of range.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.name: invalidSource(_:count:)

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.abstract: Source map decoding failed because a VLQ sequence has the wrong number of entries.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.name: invalidVLQStringLength(_:)

types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.abstract: Source map decoding failed because a VLQ sequence does not terminate properly.
types\/sourcemaperror.html?swift#invalid.name: invalidVLQStringUnterminated(vlq:soFar:)

types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift.abstract: A source map that supports efficient mapping queries.
types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift.name: UnpackedSourceMap

types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#init.abstract: Unpack a new source map and cache the segments.
types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#init.name: init(_:)

types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#mapl.abstract: Map a location in the generated code to its source.
types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#mapl.name: map(line:column:invalidSourcePos:)

types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#segm.abstract: The expanded mapping data from sourceMap
types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#segm.name: segments

types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#segm.abstract: A formatted multi-line string describing the mapping segments.
types\/unpackedsourcemap.html?swift#segm.name: segmentsDescription
